tweet:
I’m thrilled to be at @mit_esi as part of the People and the Planet series, speaking on the greatest challenge facing not just our nation, but the entire planet: #ClimateChange.

WATCH LIVE HERE: https://twitter.com/mit_esi/status/1068610284607090688 …

Facial recognition programs in airports should be halted until Americans know 3 things:
-how their information is being protected
-how they can opt-out of this program altogether
-how TSA is mitigating the risk of racial bias https://www.cbsnews.com/news/delta-americas-first-biometric-facial-recognition-airport-terminal/ …

Underwater seismic airgun blasting for oil and gas is a significant threat to marine life and coastal economies. I will continue to fight the Trump administration every step of the way to protect our waters off of New England from #BigOil. https://www.washingtonpost.com/energy-environment/2018/11/30/trump-administration-approves-seismic-tests-that-could-harm-many-thousands-atlantic-dolphins-whales/?utm_term=.c3afae83e795 …

The #OpioidEpidemic is such a destructive force that life expectancy has decreased for the second year in a row. We cannot let this trend become the new normal. We must make treatment affordable & accessible for all so we can save lives & reverse course. https://www.bostonglobe.com/news/nation/2018/11/29/suicide-drug-overdose-push-down-life-expectancy/Kd69tEUDyot80CdLIaYzbM/story.html …

Preventing massive data breaches isn't just about protecting privacy, it’s also about protecting our pocketbooks. Breaches like the #Marriott hack can lead to identity theft and crippling financial fraud. It’s time to pass comprehensive consumer privacy and security legislation. https://twitter.com/NBCNews/status/1068471304133713921 …

This week, Republicans needed @VP to break two ties to move extremist and unqualified nominees towards lifetime appointments as federal judges. But they still aren’t confirmed. Every American must speak out so that you are why they fail and Mike Pence isn’t why they succeed.

No one should have to hope & pray that the medical device implanted in them won’t cause serious harm. If you can’t explicitly prevent industry from using a flawed device as its model for a new device then you really won’t fully protect vulnerable patients. https://www.apnews.com/9f8ea03a4d324d1ba5585680d280804b …

Your internet provider shouldn’t be allowed to decide what news you consume and what voices are heard online. #NetNeutrality is about ensuring that the internet remains an open forum for all. The strength of our democracy depends on it. pic.twitter.com/UG6rRdc3Cw

Let’s pass the Special Counsel Independence and Integrity Act and ensure that Robert Mueller can finish his job.

#ProtectMueller https://twitter.com/SenMarkey/status/1068193608434663424 …

When President Trump says a pardon for Paul Manafort is NOT “off the table,” that means a constitutional crisis IS on the table. Pardoning Manafort or otherwise obstructing the Special Counsel’s investigation would be a historical mistake.

The House has an approaching deadline to act on the CRA to restore #NetNeutrality. Another Representative signed on to the petition yesterday. We have momentum, but time is running out in this Congress. Make your voice heard and help us force a vote on the House floor.

Data collected through an app called Wehe shows that AT&T, Verizon, Sprint, and T-Mobile all slowed down at least one video streaming service. We can’t trust mobile carriers. We must force a vote in the House on #NetNeutrality before the end of the year. pic.twitter.com/xyq9PTF8mi

Congratulations to @RepKClark for her election as House Democratic Caucus vice chair. Katherine is a fearless leader, a consummate legislator, and a good friend. House Democrats are lucky to have such a fantastic leader and I am looking forward to working with her.

Eric Emond, co-founder of Massachusetts Fallen Heroes, was dedicated to service. We can never repay the debt we owe him, but we can be there for his family, just as Eric had made it his mission to be there for the families of other fallen service members.
 https://www.bostonglobe.com/metro/2018/11/28/boston-native-killed-combat-operations-afghanistan/Wv0vLf7JmJP3oV0XyBSFZK/story.html …

Right now and in this next Congress, I am going to fight for #ClimateAction, for a price on carbon, for investment in clean energy, for resilient infrastructure, and for a 100% renewable future. #ActOnClimate https://twitter.com/SenMarkey/status/1067913273616551937 …

In the last two months, we have received two of the most alarming reports to date on the threat posed by climate change. I’m on the Senate floor with @SenWhitehouse and @SenatorShaheen to discuss the @UN’s IPCC report and the National Climate Assessment. https://www.pscp.tv/w/1vAxRyjqOAXJl

I voted to end America’s support for the Saudi-led war in Yemen. Every cent we spend refueling Saudi warplanes that are indiscriminately bombing civilians would be better spent providing humanitarian aid to Yemen’s people and devising a political solution to end this war.
The Trump administration needs to ensure that refugees already in dire conditions do not suffer even more.

My thanks to @NatalieGrant and @Shawna_SolCntr, who are dedicated to eliminating the scourge of human trafficking, for their important testimony today. We discussed the plight of the #Rohingya. Many are at risk of being victims of trafficking. pic.twitter.com/2SBMF8M43l

Pompeo gets it wrong in his @WSJ op-ed. Saudi Arabia is not a partner worth having when it abuses human rights. Leadership isn't about an amoral pursuit of material benefit & profit. It's about applying our values to friends & foes alike, even when - especially when - it's hard. https://twitter.com/WSJopinion/status/1067782690907279360 …

There are few people in America who have more experience in and zeal for voter suppression than Thomas Farr. But one vote he can’t rig is his Senate confirmation. He must be denied a lifetime judgeship. I'll be voting NO.

I'm glad the @US_FDA is evaluating and revising the 510(k) approval process. Limiting the use of older predicates will reduce the likelihood that a new medical device could be approved based off a dangerous, harmful predicate. https://www.cnbc.com/2018/11/26/fda-to-overhaul-510k-medical-device-approval-process.html …

5.1 BILLION robocalls were placed in October alone. These harassers and scammers need to be stopped. @ColumbiaGasMA should be ashamed. Today, we’re demanding answers. The people of the Commonwealth have had to wait too long. pic.twitter.com/FkUEJEwrxS

International students: #YouAreWelcomeHere in the United States. You create jobs, drive research, and enrich America's classrooms. I promise to fight any effort by the Trump administration to threaten your status. Thank you for being America's best ambassadors.

Your car has become a tool of corporate surveillance, leaving your privacy protections in the dust. Drivers and occupants deserve meaningful control over the personal information collected by vehicles. If Whitaker does recuse himself… Congress must pass legislation protecting the Special Counsel. 

#ProtectMueller pic.twitter.com/Am7YCzjHv3

You being taken for a ride by Kim Jong Un certainly is “nothing happening out of the normal,” Mr. President. But there should be nothing “normal” about a murderous dictator and his regime continuing to build nuclear-armed missiles that can reach the U.S. https://twitter.com/realDonaldTrump/status/1062391577807601664 …

If every state had Massachusetts’s gun laws - such as requiring would-be gun buyers to have a 1-on-1 interview with a police officer - we would save thousands of lives. 

My bill, the MASS Act, incentivizes states to adopt similarly tough gun laws. https://www.vox.com/2018/11/13/17658028/massachusetts-gun-control-laws-licenses …
Without these verifiable steps, we can only assume that Kim Jong Un is not serious about denuclearization, only serious about stringing along a gullible American president.

President Trump is getting played by Kim Jong Un. We cannot have another summit with #NorthKorea unless and until the Kim regime takes concrete, tangible actions to halt and roll back its nuclear weapons and ballistic missile programs. https://www.nytimes.com/2018/11/12/us/politics/north-korea-missile-bases.html …

This #VeteransDay, I am thankful for the incredible staff of @HomeBaseProgram's National Center of Excellence in Boston, whose mission to offer world-class care for our veterans and help heal the invisible wounds of those who have sacrificed. Today and every day we thank you. pic.twitter.com/CsUTUvGl2c

We can never fully repay the sacrifice so many brave Americans have made for this country. But on #VeteransDay, we commit to honoring our veterans not just on one day of the year, but every day. We must fight for them just as they fought for us.

Wireless carriers said they didn’t need #NetNeutrality rules and promised to self-enforce. We knew voluntary commitments wouldn’t work, and now we have the proof. This is why we need net neutrality: wireless carriers can’t be trusted to do the right thing. https://www.bloomberg.com/news/articles/2018-11-08/sprint-is-throttling-microsoft-s-skype-service-study-finds …

My heart is with the victims of the #ThousandOaks shooting. Gun violence is an epidemic. It’s relentless. But we can’t get fatigued or become numb to tragedy. We too must be relentless in our efforts to stop the bloodshed, to pass real legislation. We owe it to those we’ve lost.

Sessions faithfully carried out Trump's extremist agenda. Yet Trump fired him before all the midterm ballots have been counted. If Trump tries to fire Deputy AG Rosenstein next, it will trigger a constitutional crisis. Now more than ever we must protect Special Counsel Mueller.

Democrats just have to point to our record and tell the truth: we will protect Medicare, Medicaid, and coverage for pre-existing conditions.
